meanings.definition: People who argue or quarrel, especially in a petty or tiresome manner.
meanings.sent1: The bickerers in the office never seemed to agree on anything.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood was filled with bickerers who couldn't stop arguing over small things.
meanings.sent3: The bickerers at the party kept going back and forth over who should choose the music.
meanings.sent4: The bickerers in the family were like two stubborn goats butting heads.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bickerers squabbling over the last piece of cake was hard to forget.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in petty arguments or quarrels.
meanings.sent1: The constant bickering in the classroom made it hard to focus on the lesson.
meanings.sent2: Their bickerers about whose turn it was to do the dishes could be heard throughout the house.
meanings.sent3: The bickerers over the remote control turned into a silly game of tug-of-war.
meanings.sent4: The bickerers in the play were like two clashing swords in a fierce battle.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the bickerers arguing over the best pizza toppings lingered in their minds.
